name: pnp-devproxy-northwinddb
title: CRUD APIs with Northwind database data
shortDescription: This sample contains a set of CRUD APIs based on the Northwind database data. Use this API to get mock data in your app. This sample contains mock CRUD APIs for product categories, customers, employees, orders, products, shippers, suppliers and territories. See the sample readme on GitHub for the list of available endpoints.
longDescription: This sample contains a set of CRUD APIs based on the Northwind database data. Use this API to get mock data in your app. This sample contains mock CRUD APIs for product categories, customers, employees, orders, products, shippers, suppliers and territories. See the sample readme on GitHub for the list of available endpoints.

references.name: Use preset configurations
references.description: Instructions on how to configure the Dev Proxy to use a different configuration file.
